result.eng: I like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ga: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.orig: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.html: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom bricfeasta mór a iṫe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.eng: Do you eat meat on Fridays?
result.ga: An itheann tú feoil Dé hAoine
result.orig: An itheann tú feoil Dé hAoine
result.html: An itheann tú feoil Dé hAoineDo you eat meat on Fridays?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú feoil Dé hAoineDo you eat meat on Fridays?

result.eng: Do you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ga: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.orig: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.html: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireaċt sa ḃaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?

result.eng: Would you like a bite to eat?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat greim bia
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat greim bia
result.html: Ar mhaith leat greim biaWould you like a bite to eat?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat greim biaWould you like a bite to eat?

result.eng: She doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ga: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.orig: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.html: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ponchtml: Ní iṫeann sí glasraí ná torṫaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ga: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.orig: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.html: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃíonn am agam iṫe fiú aṁáinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.eng: Do you eat lunch early?
result.ga: An itheann tú lón go luath

result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú lón go luaṫDo you eat lunch early?

result.eng: Do you eat fish?

result.html: An itheann tú iascDo you eat fish?

result.eng: What else do they have here to eat?

result.eng: I eat every type of food.

result.ponchtml: Iṫim ċuile ẛórt biaI eat every type of food.

result.eng: I don't eat meat. I am a vegetarian.

result.eng: What do you want to eat this morning?

result.eng: Eat your breakfast!

result.eng: I eat my dinner between seven and eight.
result.ga: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hocht
result.orig: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hocht
result.html: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hochtI eat my dinner between seven and eight.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim mo ḋinnéar idir a seaċt agus a hoċtI eat my dinner between seven and eight.

result.eng: What time do you eat your dinner?
result.ga: Cén t-am a itheann tú do dhinnéar

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair

result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
